resources.string:
EZ Time Tracker
Version $versionName$
$about$

History

EZ Time Tracker up to Version 1.6 was developed in 2010 by Eric Z,
the sources are hosted at svn repository@googlecode.com.

Since 2012 EZ Time Tracker is developed by k3b,
the sources are hosted at git repository@github.com.

Improvements v2.5.8 2013-10-24
  • fixed crash in detailreport by category and in create new.
  • fixed summaryreport by category: context-filter category+super date for drilldown/delete.
  • reimplemented DetailReport.

Improvements v2.5 2013-10-07
  • Categories can now be marked and visualized as expired. Via settings you decide if you want to see them or not.
  • TimeSheetReports/Deletes can now be filtered by punchin notes.
  • TimeSheetDetailReport gets a contextmenuitem to show details of the summary or in the delete items show wich items would be affected.
  • Immediate punchin with the same category as previos punchout will append to previos to cope accidental punchout by Llama. (See Settings.minPunchInTreshhold.)
  • Punchin with immediate Punchout can be discarded to cope accidental punchin by Llama. (See Settings.minPunchOutTreshhold.)

Improvements v2.0 - v2.4
  • A remote brodcast api allow other android apps to trigger EZ Time Tracker events.
    This way Android Llama can be used to do Location based time tracking: Recording when entering/leaving job/buro.
  • German/English localisations,
    Support for culture specific Date/Time formats
  • Improved CSV export
  • Date/Time entry with new Dateslider.
  • sqLite Database can be made public so that other android apps like aSQLiteManager can access it.

Links

  • Source code at svn repository@googlecode.com of original EZ Time Tracker Version 1.6
    http://eztimetracker.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/
  • Eric Z-s Homepage of EZ Time Tracker
    http://zettsetttech.blogspot.com/
  • source code of current version of EZ Time Tracker at git repository@github.com
    https://github.com/k3b/EzTimeTracker
  • Homepage of new EzTimeTracker
    https://github.com/k3b/EzTimeTracker/wiki
  • Dateslider for Android
    http://code.google.com/p/android-dateslider/
  • Licence for Ez Time Tracker and Dateslider
    Apache License, Version 2.0.
    http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
  • Kebab-s android app Llama can be used to create location based event that can trigger EZ Time Tracker punch in/out
    http://kebabapps.blogspot.com/search/label/Llama
  • aSQLiteManager a generic database app that can be used to access EZ Time Tracker database
    http://aaa.andsen.dk/aSQLiteManager.html
